snippet: Twenty coffins were involved in the mass funeral for local militants said to have been killed in neighboring Afghanistan.
abstract: Mass funeral for Pakistani militants allegedly killed by American airstrikes in Afghanistan is attended by hundreds of mourners; Afghan officials report surge in number of Pakistani fighters involved in Taliban offensives.
lead_paragraph: Twenty coffins were involved in the mass funeral for local militants said to have been killed in neighboring Afghanistan.

headline.main: Funeral in Pakistan for Militants Killed in U.S. Strikes Draws Hundreds
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; Pakistan: Hundreds Mourn Militants
